project.description: project targets a named project's metadata.

replace.description: replace replaces a target's metadata with a new metadata mapping.

addKey.description: add_key adds a new key to the target object's metadata.

editKey.description: edit_key adds or changes a key in the target object's metadata.

deleteKey.description: delete_key removes a key from the target object's metadata.

Edit.title: Edit
Edit.description: Edit represents editing one piece of metadata.

key.description: key is the metadata key to add.  It may not be the empty string.

value.description: value is the value to assign to the metadata key.

metadata.Edit.AddKey.title: Add Key
metadata.Edit.AddKey.description: AddKey is an operation that adds a new metadata key.

key.description: key is the metadata key to remove.  It may not be the empty string.

metadata.Edit.DeleteKey.title: Delete Key
metadata.Edit.DeleteKey.description: DeleteKey is an operation that removes a metadata key.

key.description: key is the metadata key to change or add.  It may not be the empty string.

value.description: value is the value to assign to the metadata key.

metadata.Edit.EditKey.title: Edit Key
metadata.Edit.EditKey.description: EditKey is an operation that changes or adds a metadata key.

replacement.description: replacement is the map to replace the object's metadata with.

metadata.Edit.Replace.title: Replace
metadata.Edit.Replace.description: Replace is an operation that replaces metadata.

pfs_v2.ProjectPicker.title: Project Picker
pfs_v2.ProjectPicker.description: ProjectPicker defines mutually exclusive pickers that resolve to a single project. Currently, the only way to pick a project is by using a project name. Picker messages should only be used as request parameters.
